name: Flashback
flavor: The target is thrown several seconds back through time and gets to do it all again.

metadata.flavor: The target is thrown several seconds back through time and gets to do it all again.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The target uses an ability with a base Heroic Resource cost of 7 or lower that they've previously used this round, without needing to spend the base cost. Augmentations to the ability can be paid for as usual.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: You take 1d6 damage and are slowed (save ends).
